item.description: We are getting together tonight to cheer on the Boston Red Sox in game 1 of the 2007 World Series. Rain, though, is in the forecast for Boston tonight. But as they say: when it rains it pours... and I am referring to beer. So come join the rest of our friendly group and at least share a pint in what hopes to be an exciting night. (We are meeting in Providence and I will choose a location in the next 20 minutes feel free to email me your suggestions. Check the website for details and please RSVP ASAP.)
item.name: Last Min. Red Sox Meetup
